aces it wasn't too bad

ave several hundred methods

ms the problem lies in the Documentum

 What am I missing?

The "too many moving parts" comment was directed at my=
 test code ie I 
needed to add too much custom code to the mocks to allow t=
hem to talk 
to each other as required. It is directly attributable to the =

Documentum API and the interconnectedness of its many interfaces. It 
has =
nothing to do with the usefulness of jmock etc.
